entry.title: Friday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Snow ending this morning then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries late this morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers this afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h this morning except southwest 40 gusting to 60 over southwestern sections late this morning and this afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM PDT Friday 31 March 2023
